title: Ticket Question
body: I was just curious how long it would take for a ticket to go through normally? I don't mind but in my case I don't think I should play until it goes through and I was wondering maybe how long that would be, thanks!

replies.body: Response time may depend on different factors like the size of the queue for that day and what the issue is- some may take more investigation time than others.  I was able to confirm that your ticket was received and escalated to the proper team to help out.  Hang tight and a specialist will reach out!
